import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const[tours,setTours]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTours=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get('/api/tours');setTours(res.data);setLoading(false);}catch(err){setError('Failed to fetch tours');setLoading(false);}};fetchTours();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Welcome to Virtual Tours"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tour-list",children:tours.map(tour=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tour-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:tour.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Location: ",tour.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/tour/".concat(tour._id),children:"View Tour"})]},tour._id))})]});}export default Home;
